trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_SEQ_00<tab>Yayake wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Thaumaturges' Guild.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_SEQ_01<tab>Yayake has bid you seek out the eldest of five brothers, thaumaturge siblings who each bear the title of guildmaster. Speak with Cocobygo in the inner sanctum of the Thaumaturges' Guild.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_SEQ_02<tab>After some confusion as to which brother you should be speaking to, you are eventually accepted into the Thaumaturges' Guild. Equip your new scepter and speak with Cocobuki once more.
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Cocobygo.
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_YAYAKE_000_1<tab>Well, adventurer? Will you join our guild, or do you presume to ignore the urgings of impatient destiny?

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_YAYAKE_000_2<tab>A wise decision, indeed. To prepare for your initiation, I would have you study the volumes of fundamental thaumaturgical principle. All one hundred and eight of them.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_YAYAKE_000_3<tab>...Or at least, I <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> if such requirements had not been abolished. “Too great a deterrent to fresh novices,” they said. I suppose you shall just have to settle for calling upon the collective wisdom of our guildmasters.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_YAYAKE_000_4<tab>We have five, you see─all brothers of the same house. Though they all wield supreme authority, it is the eldest who provides a singular voice for the guild when one is required. Master Coco... Cocoby...? Cocobygo! ...I believe.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_YAYAKE_000_10<tab>You choose to close your eyes to fate's beckoning hand? Very well, but you cannot avoid this path forever. Sooner or later, your steps will bring you back to the Ossuary...and our guild.
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBYGO_000_20<tab>Who!? What!? Oh. Thal's teeth, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((man)) /var>, did your mother never tell you not to startle a thaumaturge?

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBANI_000_21<tab>Look at that expectant face, Cocobygo! This <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((gentleman)) /var> is obviously a new applicant for the guild seeking audience with our eldest brother.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBEZI_000_22<tab>Oh, Prelate Yayake... She can recite the three hundred and seven verses of the <var 1A 02 /var>Funerary Rites for the Virtuous Fallen<var 1A 01 /var>, but the simple task of keeping our names straight seems ever beyond her grasp.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBOHA_000_23<tab>Bwahahahaha! Well, I for one find the constant confusion endlessly entertaining! My apologies, <var 08 E905 ((my dear)) ((good sir)) /var>, my merriment was not meant to mock your mistake. It is our sibling Coco<var 1A 02 /var>buki<var 1A 01 /var> with whom you should speak.
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_25<tab>What's this, what's this? Thal has led to us a new aspirant?
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBYGO_000_26<tab>Aaah! Cocobuki! Were you here the entire time!?

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_27<tab>Greetings, child. I am Cocobuki, the eldest─and, I would venture to say, the wisest─of the five masters of the Thaumaturges' Guild. It is my solemn duty to furnish our would-be initiates with a succinct understanding of our beloved art, thus I would have your fullest attention.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_28<tab>To wield thaumaturgy is to unleash devastation of the highest magnitude. The lethal force of our spells far exceeds the destructive capability of any other form of arcane manipulation.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_29<tab>Fire, lightning, blizzards, somnolence─the thaumaturge calls upon an expansive arsenal of offensive incantations to incapacitate and obliterate all manner of adversaries.
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_33<tab>Open your mind to our sorcerous teachings, and you, too, shall soon hold the unparalleled power of our discipline in the palm of your hand.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_34<tab>Hm hm hm... Of course, such power has a price. You must be willing to plunge headfirst into the forbidding chasm of thaumaturgy's secrets─for advancement in this art comes only with the completion of deadly and terrible trials.
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_36<tab>I ask you now, aspirant: are you prepared to leap into the abyss in pursuit of power unrivaled?
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_Q1_001_1<tab>Are you prepared to leap into the abyss?
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_A1_001_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_A2_001_1<tab>No

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_40<tab>Hm hm hm... A confident response. Your name, if you will? Very well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let us mark your initiation with three eminently practical gifts.
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_41<tab>My first gift to you shall be an addition to your hunting log─the names of such enemies that will prove suitable to your training as a thaumaturge.
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_42<tab>The second and third gifts are this scepter and shield─instruments you shall need to focus the destructive force of your will.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_43<tab>Did you believe your initiation over? My dear disciple, we have only just begun. Take your new weapons in hand, and I will set you forth upon your first trial...

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_COCOBUKI_000_50<tab>Have my words lodged a splinter of fear in your mind? We are patient, aspirant─return to us again once your undeniable ambition has scoured this wasted terror from your thoughts.
TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_SYSTEM_000_60<tab>You have unlocked a new class! You can change to this class at any time by equipping the weapon received from this quest.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_SYSTEM_000_61<tab>When changing classes, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gear sets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will allow you to register and save your equipment. You may then use them to switch between classes instantly without the need to manually equip weapons or equipment.

TEXT_CLSTHM011_00344_SYSTEM_000_62<tab>A button for the Gear Set interface is located in the upper portion of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window.
